p: The diabetic group mice showed a significant upsurge ( P < 0.05) of urea, BUN, uric acid, and creatinine levels in the plasma compared to the control groups ( Figure 7 a,b). However, diabetic mice treated with the C. auriculata root extract and metformin showed significantly lower plasma urea, BUN, uric acid, and creatinine levels, indicating the attenuation of alteration in the plasma levels of renal markers caused by diabetes.
